item.title: Basic Git Commands
item.description: Add remote repository git remote add origin https://github.com/user/repo.git Check Remote Repository git remote -v Stage All Changes git stage -all Change Current Branch Name git branch -m <newname> Change Any Branch Name git branch -m <old-name> <new-name> Adding existing repository to Git Link
